description:
This structure contains information about one delivery destination in your account.

A delivery destination is an AWS resource that represents an AWS service that logs can be sent to CloudWatch Logs, Amazon S3, are supported as Kinesis Data Firehose delivery destinations.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a resource.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 16  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: [\w#+=/:,.@-]*\*?  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

DeliveryDestinationName.description: The name of the delivery destination to assign this policy to
DeliveryDestinationName.markdownDescription:
The name of the delivery destination to assign this policy to

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 60  
Update requires: No interruption

DeliveryDestinationPolicy.description: The contents of the policy attached to the delivery destination
DeliveryDestinationPolicy.markdownDescription:
The contents of the policy attached to the delivery destination

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 51200  
Update requires: No interruption

DestinationPolicy.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of this delivery destination.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of this delivery destination.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 60  
Pattern: [\w-]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

DestinationResourceArn.description: The ARN of the Amazon Web Services destination that this delivery destination represents. That Amazon Web Services destination can be a log group in CloudWatch Logs, an Amazon S3 bucket, or a delivery stream in Firehose.
DestinationResourceArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the Amazon Web Services destination that this delivery destination represents. That Amazon Web Services destination can be a log group in CloudWatch Logs, an Amazon S3 bucket, or a delivery stream in Firehose.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: The tags that have been assigned to this delivery destination.
Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags that have been assigned to this delivery destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

DeliveryDestinationPolicy.description:
IAM policy that grants permissions to CloudWatch Logs to deliver logs cross-account to a specified destination in this account.

The policy must be in JSON string format.

Length Constraints: Maximum length of 51200
DeliveryDestinationPolicy.markdownDescription:
IAM policy that grants permissions to CloudWatch Logs to deliver logs cross-account to a specified destination in this account.

The policy must be in JSON string format.

Length Constraints: Maximum length of 51200

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies this delivery destination.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies this delivery destination.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

DeliveryDestinationType.description: Displays whether this delivery destination is CloudWatch Logs, Amazon S3, or Kinesis Data Firehose.
DeliveryDestinationType.markdownDescription:
Displays whether this delivery destination is CloudWatch Logs, Amazon S3, or Kinesis Data Firehose.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: ^[0-9A-Za-z]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
